name: Rewind (itch) (Korpsian)
description:
A little buggy jump and run game where the main idea is to rewind the lvl. 

It was the first platformer I programmed and also the time was a little short because of other things... 

Well at least we tried ^^ (The Main Menu is cool thou) 

Programming: Korbinian Maag

Art: Sait Demirsoy
